title: 820-3437 doesn't charge
message:
Without the battery everything works perfectly, The battery doesn't charge if the laptop is connected to power, however it will be recognized in OS and charge if after the laptop has already been turned on you connect the battery to the mainboard.

The current sensing and U7100 are all working fine.

Where to start?

title: 820-3437 doesn't charge
message: Still sounds like a current sense issue. Did you check resistance between pins 17/18, 27/28? Q7155 is also suspect.
